Content:: Ananda Lakshman Wijemanna (born 19 June 1960) is a Sri Lankan politician and a member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka. He represents Kalutara District and he is the district leader and organiser of United National Party.[1]  This article about a politician from Western Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
